title: 81: Trooper Moore Talks  Alex Stealing His Money & His Involvement In The Stephen Smith Case
description:
Trooper Thomas Moore was injured in an accident while on duty in 2018.
Alex Murdaugh stole money that belonged to Trooper Moore.
Trooper Moore tells us about the accident, how Alex stole the money, and how Moore is still waiting on Workers' Compensation to help him with his injuries and his finances.
Trooper Moore was one of the first people on the scene when Stephen Smith was found dead in the middle of the road.
Trooper Moore has very strong opinion on that case. He wants to clear the name of Highway Patrol.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
